gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content:
Set within an alternate history parallel to our own, KONIVRER (pronounced Conjurer) is a strategic, expandable card game where players take on the role of powerful magic users called "Conjurers." Build powerful decks representing your grimoire and battle head-to-head to reduce your opponent's Life Cards to 0.

**Game Details:** 30â€“60 minutes, Ages 12+, 2+ players (supports 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, and free-for-all)

**Components:** 6x Element Flags, 2x 63-card intro sets, Rulebook, Optional dice for counters

deckBuilding.content:

Your Flag determines what elements your deck can use and provides bonus damage against certain elements.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.content:
**Setup:** Place your Flag in the top left, shuffle your deck and place it top right, then place the top 4 cards face-down as your Life Cards below your Flag.

**Game Zones:**
â€¢ **Field** - Where Familiars and Spells are played
â€¢ **Combat Row** - Area for Familiar battles
â€¢ **Azoth Row** - Where resource cards are placed
â€¢ **Life Cards** - Your 4 face-down cards that determine victory
â€¢ **Hand** - Cards you can play
â€¢ **Removed from Play** - Cards affected by Void

**Game Phases (repeat until victory):**
1. **Start Phase** - Draw 2 cards (first turn only), optionally place 1 card as Azoth
2. **Main Phase** - Play cards by resting Azoth to pay costs
3. **Combat Phase** - Attack with Familiars
4. **Post-Combat** - Play additional cards if resources allow
5. **Refresh Phase** - Refresh all rested Azoth

**Ways to Play Cards:**
â€¢ **Summon** - Play as Familiar on Field with +1 counters = Azoth paid for âœ¡âƒ
â€¢ **Spell** - Play from hand, resolve ability, then put on bottom of deck
â€¢ **Azoth** - Place face-up in Azoth Row as resource
â€¢ **Tribute** - Reduce costs by removing your Familiars from game
â€¢ **Burst** - Play for free when drawn as damage from Life Cards
